rules_text:
Whenever Monster-to-Be deals damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
As long as Monster-to-Be has a counter on it, it has menace and isn't a Citizen.
As long as Monster-to-Be has four or more counters on it, it has indestructible and lifelink and is a Horror.
notes: Might not want to cost the same as Grizzled Mentor
